entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
